title: RADS Error "Could not connect to http server........"
body: I have been experiencing RADS Error in the past few hours and it have not been solved even after I used the method of changing DNS servers. So is this my personal problem or server problem??

replies.body: I'd like to help but need some more information!  I have a good idea, but I'd like to make sure.  Where exactly are you receiving this error?  What's happening and at what point?  For example, is it when you load the patcher, logging in, etc?  Anything can help!
It's alright now. Problem solved after I reinstall the game. Thanks for helping anyway!
